named-query.name: Restaurante.consultarPorNome
named-query.query: from Restaurante where nome like concat('%', :nome, '%') and cozinha.id = :idCozinha

named-query.name: Restaurante.existsResponsavel
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurante rest join rest.responsaveis resp where rest.id = :idRestaurante and resp.id = :idUsuario
